DOC.detailed_description: Multicenter , randomize , control clinical trial conduct August 28 , 2001 April 23 , 2004 , 102 pediatric patient 7 US pediatric intensive care unit age 2 week 18 year treat supine vs. prone positioning . Randomization conceal group assignment blind . Patients randomize either supine prone position within 48 hour meet acute lung injury criterion , patient prone group position within 4 hour randomization remain prone 20 hour day acute phase illness maximum 7 day , position supine . Both group treat use lung protective ventilator sedation protocol , extubation readiness testing , hemodynamic , nutrition , skin care guideline .
